Quizzie in JS/CSS

Spring 2014

See it on Codepen

Design, HTML, CSS/Scss

Practice using JS and CSS to create an internet-style quizzie

This site is designed and hand-coded by myself, using a custom responsive grid, HTML5 validated, CSS validated, optimized for accessibility, with minimal JavaScript enhancements. It's powered by github.io with Jekyll blog integration.
